translation: The Blessed Lord said, "When light, activity, and delusion are present, he does not hate them, nor does he long for them when they are absent.
commentary: 14.22 light light? f and? instinct activity? f and? Moham delusion? Eve even? f and? Pandavas Or Arjuna? Not not? hates hates? sampravrttani (when) gone forth? Not not? retired when absent? desires longs.Commentary This is the answer to Arjunas first estion. Is light the effect of Sattva? activity of Rajas and delusion of Tamas. The liberated sage does not hate them when they are present. When
